title: when use @PathParam , generic parameters is error
body:
### Describe the bug

i copy quarkus demo，io.quarkus.resteasy.reactive.server.test.resource.basic.resource.GenericResourceCrudResource
but idea tips error, Details below：

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/123947449/215459249-e0dfb736-bdc1-4fe4-a4ff-7243b3015a43.png)

error info is

java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not create converter for java.lang.Object for method io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<ENTITY_IDENTIFIER_TYPE> get(ENTITY_IDENTIFIER_TYPE entityIdentifierType) on class io.isdp.permit.crud.cmd.AbstractCurdCmd of type PATH

so，please solve IT。3Q
